attributes.action: Common Ownership - Utilities: Gas, Electricity, & Water.
attributes.additional_details:
Petition: The H.M. Government, the Elected Representatives of the People, To consider, and to act in accordance with the wishes of the people, namely, that the Nations common resources will be secured and held by the Nation for the Nation. It is our Wish, our appeal, our demand that Members of Parliament act with integrity and urgency to secure all Utilities for our nation, inline with our declaration for our Security, and Sovereignty. To enshrine in Law that all the named resources: Gas, Electricity, and Water, are secured for the Nation, and remain the property of our nation.
 We the undersigned; call upon our Government to account for its lack of Governance and the alarming ignorance with regard to Governmental failure to provide a just, social and secure access to our sovereign resources. Namely, Gas, Electricity, and Water.
